snippet: The problem in the first head-to-head with Hillary Clinton, he said, was that the people operating the soundboard had been “oscillating” as he spoke, changing the levels of his voice....
lead_paragraph: The problem in the first head-to-head with Hillary Clinton, he said, was that the people operating the soundboard had been “oscillating” as he spoke, changing the levels of his voice.

headline.main: Donald Trump Adjusts His Complaints About Debate Microphone
